title: Define Project Scope and Requirements: OceanPlasticCleanupDrone
description: Gather, document, and prioritize the functional and non-functional requirements for the OceanPlasticCleanupDrone project. This includes both hardware (drone design, navigation, waste collection) and software aspects (autonomous operation, material processing, data management). Also, specify the performance criteria, safety standards, environmental considerations, and potential integration with existing ocean cleanup initiatives. Consider the following areas of focus: hardware robustness for marine environments, energy efficiency in navigation and processing, data security during transmission and storage, and user-friendly interfaces for remote operation and monitoring.

title: Design the Drone Hardware
description: Develop plans and specifications for the drone's mechanical design, including sensors, actuators, and power systems.

title: Design the Drone's Navigation System
description: Create a system for the drone to navigate oceans autonomously, accounting for variables like wind, waves, and ocean currents.

title: Develop AI for Object Detection and Recognition
description: Implement computer vision algorithms to identify plastic waste in images and video captured by the drone.

title: Implement Waste Collection Mechanism
description: Develop a system for the drone to collect plastic waste using suction, magnets or other methods.
dependencies: Develop AI for Object Detection and Recognition

title: Design Processing System for Plastic Waste
description: Create a system to process the collected plastic waste into reusable materials or fuel.

title: Develop User Interface for Monitoring Drone Operations
description: Design an intuitive interface for users to monitor the drone's progress, adjust its course, and gather data.

title: Set Up Cloud Infrastructure for Data Storage and Processing
description: Establish a cloud infrastructure to store and process data collected by the drone, as well as manage user interactions.
dependencies: Develop User Interface for Monitoring Drone Operations

title: Test and Validate Functionality of Individual Components
description: Perform unit testing and integration testing on each component of the system.
dependencies: Complete all subtasks under 'Design' and 'Development' sections

title: Conduct Security Audit on System
description: Identify and address potential security vulnerabilities in the system.
dependencies: Test and Validate Functionality of Individual Components

title: Document System Architecture and Component Interactions - RFC
description: Provide comprehensive documentation detailing the system's design, components, and their interactions. Include diagrams, clear explanations for each component, and their roles in the overall system. This task is a part of the 'Design' phase. The documentation should include the following sections: Overview, System Components, Data Flow Diagram, Inter-Component Communication, and Security Considerations.
dependencies: Complete all subtasks under 'Design' and 'Development' sections
